DOC.brief_title: Treating Chinese Smokers With Interactive Expert System
DOC.detailed_description: The research study examine feasibility , implementation , efficacy interactive expert system intervention smoke cessation Chinese American population . The primary specific aim propose research test follow hypothesis : 1 ) Proactive recruitment approach effective recruiting smoker precontemplation ( intent quit smoke next 6 month ) reactive approach . 2 ) Participants experimental condition receive interactive stage-matched expert system intervention plus manual likely abstinent 12 18 control condition receive non-interactive standard manual . 3 ) Participants receive interactive expert system intervention likely report least one quit attempt control condition month 6 , 12 , 18 . 4 ) Participants receive interactive expert system intervention likely significant decrease number cigarette smoke control condition month 3 , 6 , 12 , 18 . After intervention adaptation pilot test phase study procedure , study achieve aim use randomized trial target 400 Chinese American Smokers follow-up assessment 3 , 6 , 12 , 18 month baseline .
DOC.criteria: resident San Francisco Bay Area age 18 old selfidentified Chinese ethnicity able read English Chinese smoke least 100 cigarette lifetime currently smoke least 5 cigarette past 7 day currently engage smoke cessation effort .
